alert.note: Alert for Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 8:32PM CDT until June 24 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Grant County in southwestern Wisconsin... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 831 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lancaster to near Dickeyville to near Sageville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Dickeyville around 840 PM CDT. Platteville and Hazel Green around 850 PM CDT. Cuba City around 855 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Kieler, Lock And Dam 11, Sandy Hook, Arthur, Potosi, Livingston and Union. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
